name: Dice and Seek - [GMTK 2022]
description:
GAME PRESENTATION For GMTK 2022

In Dice and Seek, you play as a dice tamer looking for his captured dice friends. Fight the Marbles and find the different secrets present in this colorful platformer. Beware, a roll of the dice will disrupt (or not) your journey at the beginning of each level...

HOW TO PLAY

Credits
